title: drug_administrations
description: Array of all drug administration protocol of a given profile. Contains one [object per administration protocol](./drug_administrations-drug_administration.md)

items.title: drug_administration
items.description: Drug administration protocol. One per administered compound and respective formulation.

administrations.title: administrations
administrations.description: Array of drug administrations per administration protocol. One per administered dose.

items.title: administration
items.description: Object describing a single drug administration.

time.description: Time point of the drug administration.

duration.description: Duration of the drug administration i.e., in case of infusions.

administered_compound.description: Compound name of the administered compound. Must match compound_name or compound_alias of compoundInfo.

formulation.description: Formulation of the administered doses, e.g., immediate release tablet

formulation_comment.description: Additional information about the formulation, e.g., brand name.

administration_route.description: Route of the administration, e.g., oral.

meta:enum.transdermal: Drug was administered via the skin.
